sentences.en: a smudge of lipstick on a cup
Blur a little the painted parts with the Smudge Tool.
sentences.cn: 使用涂抹工具将眼睛周围的装扮涂模糊一点点.

sentences.en: Don’t touch it! You’ll smudge the ink.
sentences.cn: 别碰它！你会把墨水抹花的。

sentences.en: Loose flow of hair painted with airbrush, line tool and smudge.
sentences.cn: 应用喷枪工具 、 直线工具和涂抹工具来画出头发的走势.

sentences.en: Oh yes , and there was the little black smudge on his nose.
sentences.cn: 噢,是的, 鼻子上还有小块的脏东西.

sentences.en: She kissed me, careful not to smudge me with her fresh lipstick.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地吻了我，以免把刚刚抹上的口红弄到我脸上。

sentences.en: Smudge - A defect or contamination found on the wafer caused by fingerprints.
sentences.cn: 划伤 - 晶圆片表面上的小皱造成的缺陷.

sentences.en: Smudge the outline using a cotton-wool bud.
sentences.cn: 用一根棉签把轮廓抹花。

sentences.en: Streaks of hair fined out using smudge tool and small hard brushes.
sentences.cn: 用模糊工具和小的硬笔刷来刻画头发的纹理.

sentences.en: The police identified the murderer from a smudge of blood on the shirt.
sentences.cn: 警方从衬衫上的血迹辨认出凶手.

sentences.en: The police identified the murderess from a smudge of blood on the shirt.
sentences.cn: 警方从衬衫上的血迹辨认出女凶手.

sentences.en: When you look at the photographs, please be careful and don't smudge them.
sentences.cn: 看照片的时候仔细点儿,别弄脏了.

sentences.en: You have a smudge of chocolate on your shirt.
sentences.cn: 你的衬衫上有一块巧克力的污渍.

sentences.en: You've got a smudge on your cheek.
You'vegot a smudge of soot on your cheek.

trans.tran_cn: 污点，污迹，浓烟，冒浓烟的火堆，模糊的字迹

trans.tran_en: if ink, writing etc smudges, or if you smudge it, it becomes dirty and unclear because it has been touched or rubbed

trans.tran_cn: 弄脏，使冒浓烟，使模糊，用浓烟熏
